about_the_game:
Step into a post-apocalyptic fairy tale world and push the boundaries of your imagination! "Cardverse" invites you to a creative adventure. In this visually storytelling game prepared with artificial intelligence, explore the thin line between the real world and the world of imagination.

Features:


  • Visual Feast: Each card represents a unique piece of art that will take you to a different world. Each one is filled with mysterious details that will trigger your imagination.
  • Explore with Your Friends: The game supports 4 to 6 players, allowing you to enjoy fun hours with your friends or family.
  • Simple Rules, Endless Fun: The rules are quite simple, making the game easy to learn. However, each gaming experience is unique, and you can master strategies over time for more fun.
  • Encourage Creative Thinking: While encouraging your imagination, the game also enhances your visual storytelling skills.
  • Various Card Packs: Various card packs will make the game different each time, offering you continuous new adventures.
  • Embark on a fairy tale journey with Cardverse and discover the limitless world waiting to be explored beyond the real world!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13.6 or newer
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal-capable GPU (AMD GCN-based GPU or newer, NVIDIA Kepler-based GPU or newer, Intel HD 4000 or newer)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 12 or newer
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (64bit) latest revision
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3210
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (64bit) latest revision
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9400F
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
